questions.question: What is the dominant color displayed prominently on the product packaging?
What specific flavor is explicitly mentioned on the product label?
What secondary color accents the primary packaging color?
What is the apparent texture of the background design element?
What type of information dominates the central portion of the packaging?
What word is prominently displayed above the nutritional information?
What is the overall shape of the displayed product container?
What is the material that the product container appears to be made of?
What is the predominant style of font used in the product branding?
What language, besides English, is used on the product label?
What descriptive term is used to further define the product flavor?
What aspect of the product's contents is highlighted numerically?
What is the apparent finish of the product packaging's surface?
What word is used to describe the product's nutritional characteristics?
What is the overall visual impression of the product label's design?
